languages.text: "Я лично совершу ритуал и прочту молитвы, чтобы умилостивить Леди Теодору".
"I will perform the ritual and pray in hopes of easing Lady Theodora's anger."
languages.original_text: "Я лично совершу ритуал и прочту молитвы, чтобы умилостивить Леди Теодору".

traits.locale_text: "I will perform the ritual and pray in hopes of easing Lady Theodora's anger."
"I will perform the ritual and pray in hopes of easing Lady Theodora's anger."
"I will perform the ritual and pray in hopes of easing Lady Theodora's anger."
"I will perform the ritual and pray in hopes of easing Lady Theodora's anger."
"I will perform the ritual and pray in hopes of easing Lady Theodora's anger."
"I will perform the ritual and pray in hopes of easing Lady Theodora's anger."

languages.text: « Je vais accomplir le rituel et prier dans l'espoir d'apaiser la colère de dame Théodora. »
languages.original_text: "I will perform the ritual and pray in hopes of easing Lady Theodora's anger."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais accomplir le rituel et prier dans l'espoir d'apaiser la colère de dame Théodora. »

languages.text: «Realizaré el ritual y rezaré con la esperanza de calmar la furia de lady Theodora».
languages.original_text: "I will perform the ritual and pray in hopes of easing Lady Theodora's anger."

traits.locale_text: «Realizaré el ritual y rezaré con la esperanza de calmar la furia de lady Theodora».

languages.text: “我会举行祈祷仪式，希望可以平息西奥多拉夫人的怒火。”
languages.original_text: "I will perform the ritual and pray in hopes of easing Lady Theodora's anger."

traits.locale_text: “我会举行祈祷仪式，希望可以平息西奥多拉夫人的怒火。”

languages.text: 「儀式を実行し、シオドーラ様の怒りを鎮めるためにお祈りをします」
languages.original_text: "I will perform the ritual and pray in hopes of easing Lady Theodora's anger."

traits.locale_text: 「儀式を実行し、シオドーラ様の怒りを鎮めるためにお祈りをします」

languages.text: "Ich führe das Ritual aus und bete, in der Hoffnung, dass das Lady Theodoras Zorn besänftigt."
languages.original_text: "I will perform the ritual and pray in hopes of easing Lady Theodora's anger."

traits.locale_text: "Ich führe das Ritual aus und bete, in der Hoffnung, dass das Lady Theodoras Zorn besänftigt."

languages.text: "Ayini gerçekleştireceğim ve bunu Leydi Theodora'nın öfkesini yatıştıracağını umacağım."
languages.original_text: "I will perform the ritual and pray in hopes of easing Lady Theodora's anger."
